about_the_game:
In the decaying underground remains of Navar, a once-glorious city sealed away by an authoritarian regime, you are a robot—a Prime Unit—unexpectedly awakened in a facility that was never meant to power on again. With only a flickering flashlight and a corrupted memory core, you must navigate a maze of dark corridors, abandoned machinery, and malfunctioning systems to uncover the truth behind your existence and the collapse of the system that created you.

💎 Key Features:

  • 🔦 Exploration: Light reveals the path—but also draws danger. Navigate pitch-black hallways and vast outdoor areas while avoiding detection by active security turrets.

  • 🏙️ Open-Ended Exploration: Move beyond claustrophobic underground corridors and step into vast open city areas, abandoned plazas, industrial zones, and forgotten rooftops. Explore freely, uncover hidden paths, and revisit areas with newly unlocked abilities.

  • 🧠 Puzzle-Focused Gameplay: Solve environmental puzzles, manipulate circuits, and uncover cryptic logs left behind by long-gone workers.

  • ⚙️ Logical Progression: Unlock new areas using access cards, reroute power in maintenance rooms, and manipulate machinery to forge ahead.

  • 📜 Lore-Driven Discovery: Read fragmented logs, decipher corrupted messages, and piece together the fall of Navar and the truth behind the Systemfall Directive.

  • 🏢 Atmospheric World: Explore industrial zones, archives, maintenance halls, vast courtyards, and sealed-off experimental labs—each telling a silent story of its downfall.

🛡️ Tactical Survival: Some threats can't be destroyed—only avoided. Stealth and resourcefulness are your best tools.

📖 Story Overview:

In the final days of the Navar Authority, the regime initiated Plan Five, a desperate attempt to centralize control through a network of obedient robots. But something went wrong. The Prime Units—robots like you—were locked away, deemed too unpredictable, too... aware.

Now, decades later, you're online.

The power flickers. The corridors groan under the weight of their secrets. And somewhere in the dark, the remnants of the Systemsfall still linger, waiting to be uncovered.

But your journey won’t end underground. Beyond the steel doors and flickering lights lies a city frozen in time, its streets empty, its towers looming like silent sentinels over the decay. The truth isn't confined to walls—it spreads across plazas, rooftops, and forgotten streets.

🤖 What Awaits in the Darkness... and Beyond?

  • Will you uncover the secrets behind your activation?

  • Will you escape the crumbling remains of Navar?

  • Will you traverse the silent streets and towering ruins of a city lost to time?

  • Or will you become just another forgotten error in the System?

Explore. Solve. Survive. Discover the truth behind Systemsfall.

➕ Add Systemsfall to your wishlist now and prepare for a journey into the ruins of control—both below and above ground.

“When the lights fade, the truth emerges.”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
